Global_Rider_In_trip_recording_PAX_I_sug: For the safety of our users, we recommend enabling the Record Trip Audio feature
Global_Rider_In_trip_recording_PAX_Landi:
I have read and agree to the DiDi Rider Privacy Policy: Both the driver and rider may start recording trip audio if they feel unsafe, and the other party will not be notified during the trip.

Audio will be encrypted and uploaded to DiDi’s internal server in real time, and the recording will automatically stop when the trip ends.

Uploading audio consumes additional data, and audio quality may vary depending on your device and other external factors.
Global_Rider_In_trip_recording_PAX_recor: If you feel unsafe, you can elect to enable the Record Trip Audio feature
This feature is available during rides only
GRider_Global_Under_the_hmOG: If you ever feel unsafe, you can use the SOS Button to contact emergency services. This should only be used in an emergency. Please see your current location information below. These details can be shared with emergency services when needed.
Global_Rider_In_trip_recording_PAX_micro: To record your trip audio, you’ll need to allow the {brand_name} app access to your microphone
GRider_improvement_In_danger_jKMi: Call the Police in an Emergency
GRider_improvement_Malicious_alerts_zhXT: It is an offence to knowingly make false police reports and penalties may apply.
GRider_improvement_Please_don_jrUD: Please only contact the police in an emergency.
GRider_improvement__brand_sSAl: [{brand_name}] We noticed that you called the police via the SOS Button. We attempted to notify your Trusted Contacts.
GRider_improvement__brand_zJJy: When you call the police, {brand_name} will try to
GRider_PAX_I_have_wNqc:
I have read and agree to the Trip Audio Recording Terms: Both the driver and rider may start recording trip audio if they feel unsafe, and the other party will not be notified during the trip. 

Audio will be encrypted and uploaded to DiDi’s internal server in real time, and the recording will automatically stop when the trip ends. Uploading audio consumes additional data, and audio may be unclear depending on your device and external factors.
GRider_improvement_After_you_akFI:
When you contact the police, {brand_name} will try to contact you to confirm you’re safe.
If you’ve added Trusted Contacts, {brand_name} will try to text them your trip details and other info (SMS deliverability may vary depending on carrier)
GRider_improvement_If_you_gmMy:
If you ever feel unsafe or are in danger, you can use the SOS Button.
Your vehicle information, location (accuracy depends on GPS signal strength) and other details will be shown in-app for easy reference so you can share them with the police.
GRider_improvement_Lie_alarms_NvYs: It is an offence to knowingly make false police reports and penalties may apply.
GRider_improvement_This_function_otve: This feature is for emergency use only. It is an offence to knowingly make false police reports and penalties may apply.
GRider_improvement__brand_FOFR: [{brand_name}] Emergency Alert! Your friend {user_name} (phone no. {phone_number}) called the police using the SOS Button. Please contact them to confirm they’re safe. Trip details: {Trip_link}.
GRider_improvement__brand_moWu: [{brand_name}] We noticed that you called the police via the SOS Button. Please follow the instructions of the police.
GRider_improvement__brand_nyJR: [{brand_name}] Emergency Alert! Your friend {user_name} (phone no. {phone_number}) called the police using the SOS Button. Please contact them to confirm they’re safe. Friend’s location: {location}.
GRider_improvement__brand_UBvB: [{brand_name}] We noticed that you called the police via the SOS Button. We attempted to notify your Trusted Contacts.
GRider_PAX_This_order_FTrq: Trip Audio Recording will be enabled
GRider_PAX_Audio_recordings_xSsa: Auto Recording will be disabled on your next trip
GRider_PAX_DiDi_is_ZCsj: {brand_name} is committed to your safety. For added protection, we suggest enabling Trip Audio Recording. Audio recordings can be used as evidence in the event of a safety issue.
GRider_PAX_Driver_Side_awNN: Driver has Trip Audio Recording enabled
GRider_PAX_Opening_automatic_HSKV: Audio recordings can be used as evidence if a safety issue occurs (it can also be disabled)
GRider_PAX_Opening_trip_qOfB: We suggest enabling Trip Audio Recording. Trip recordings can be used as evidence in the event of a safety issue.
GRider_PAX_Trip_recordings_itrW: Trip recordings can be important evidence in the event of a dispute. This can be disabled at any time
GRider_PAX_Autorecording_is_aMMS: Auto Recording will be enabled on available trips
GRider_PAX_The_current_gmMo: Auto Recording will be enabled on your next trip
GRider_PAX_Trip_recordings_otfp: Trip audio recordings can be used as evidence in the event of a safety issue. If Auto Recording is disabled, you will need to manually enable recording for each trip.
sf_emergency_assistance_latest_trip_info: SOS enables you to contact Emergency Services or the DiDi Emergency Hotline. If SOS is used, our emergency team will contact you to provide assistance. Your location details will also be shown in-app for easy reference. Please note: SOS should only be used when there is an emergency.
sf_emergency_assistance_stop_uploading_l: I’m safe now, stop trip sharing.
sf_emergency_assistance_stop_title: Are you sure you want to stop sharing?
sf_emergency_assistance_stop_message: If you stop sharing now, our emergency process will also stop.
